analysis_summary: Found significant inconsistencies between data files for offensive play outcomes

key_findings.summary: Multiple data files contain different values for the same play vs defense combinations

specific_discrepancies.status: User reports card shows -1, but all data files show -2
Major inconsistency - Ball Control and Aerial Style differ from Pro Style
Minor inconsistency - Aerial Style differs by +2 yards
Minor inconsistency - Aerial Style differs by 1 yard
Major inconsistency - Ball Control and Aerial Style differ significantly
Inconsistency in penalty yardage (+25 vs +30 vs +35)
Inconsistency in interception return yards (-20 vs -30 vs -35)

formatting_inconsistencies.notes: Space between INTERCEPT and Def, negative return yards

formatting_inconsistencies.consistent: Mostly - some entries lack O/B notation
formatting_inconsistencies.notes: Most entries use O/B, but some don't

immediate_actions: Verify actual card images against data files
Determine which data source is authoritative (cards vs data files)
Update all inconsistent data files to match authoritative source
data_quality_improvements: Establish single source of truth for play outcomes
Implement automated validation across all data files
Add data source attribution to each file
validation_needed: User verification of actual card values
Cross-reference with any other data sources
Determine if differences are intentional (style variations) or errors

impact_assessment.gameplay_impact: HIGH - Different outcomes for same play/defense combinations affect game balance
impact_assessment.ai_decision_making: HIGH - AI uses these values to make decisions
impact_assessment.user_experience: MEDIUM - Players may notice inconsistent results
impact_assessment.data_integrity: HIGH - Multiple conflicting data sources reduce trust
